detail_desc: Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with worn details with reinforcement on the inside. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, a fake fly and raw-edge hems.
Long-sleeved polo-neck top in soft jersey.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Cap with a print motif and appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Cap in patterned cotton jersey with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Elasticated fabric belt with imitation leather details and a metal buckle. Width approx. 3 cm.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams, a detachable hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets, ribbed cuffs and reflective details. Brushed, thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Plastic yoyo with a hologram motif.
Long-sleeved dress in burnout-patterned jersey with a round neck, visible seams front and back and an asymmetric, raw-edge hem. Unlined.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, zip with a chin guard at the front, side pockets, reflective details, ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, zip with a chin guard at the front, side pockets, reflective details, ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Short skirt woven in a crinkled viscose blend with a regular waist and detachable belt with a metal buckle. Concealed zip in one side, fake zipped front pockets and a seam at the hem with a two flounces, one with small decorative metal eyelets. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a crinkled viscose and nylon weave. Deep V-neck with lacing, and a frill-trimmed seam at the waist. Unlined.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Shorter, padded parka in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, ribbed stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets, two flap front pockets with a press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

Baby Exclusive. Blouse in a soft organic cotton weave with woven stripes and flounces with embroidered scalloped trims that start at the front and continue over the shoulders. Buttons at the back and a seam at the top with decorative gathers front and back. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in an organic cotton weave with a knot detail at the front and covered elastication at the back.
Cardboard pennants. Length approx. 3 m. Size of pennants 8x10 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved tops in soft, pointelle-knit organic cotton jersey with a button placket and embroidered scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in a patterned organic cotton weave. Dress with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a wrapover and cut-out section at the back and buttons at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a pleated skirt. Lined. Puff pants with elastication at the waist and hems. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft, slub jersey made from organic cotton with a text print. Elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from organic cotton with a text print. Press-stud on one shoulder and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in a textured organic cotton knit with a jersey lining. Zip down the front, a hood with ears and long raglan sleeves.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y).

Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Silicone bracelet with a glow-in-the-dark print. Size 2.3x21 cm.
Paper straw hat with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood and small appliqué at the top. Zip down the front, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem.

Halterneck jumpsuit in a crêpe weave. Lace back with an open section, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in the side. Pleats at the front, a seam at the waist with a wide band, and wide legs. Unlined.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof, breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, a reflective strip on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Adjustable elastic braces, zip fly and press-stud, wind flap with a hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and a reflective strip on one leg. Lined.
